name: Differin Acne Treatment Gel, 60 Day Supply, Retinoid Treatment for Face with 0.1% Adapalene, Gentle Skin Care for Acne Prone Sensitive Skin, 15g Tube (Pack of 2) (Packaging May Vary)
short_description: TARGETS ACNE: Clears breakouts where they start (Deep in pores) and prevents new acne from forming, which ultimately restores skin's texture and tone
CLEARS, TREATS & PREVENTS: Differin works differently than other Acne treatments by normalizing skin cell turnover and effectively targets two primary causes of Acne, clogged pores and inflammation

RX STRENGTH ACNE RETINOID: Adapalene was created for superior tolerability compared to other prescription retinoid products not containing Adapalene; It is suitable for use as part of your morning or evening regimen
DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED: Water based formula, oil free, alcohol free, fragrance free, non comedogenic; Helps reduce the risk of scarring and Hyperpigmentation by treating Acne
REAL RESULTS: In a clinical study, Differin gel provided up to 87 percent reduction in acne breakouts after 12 weeks, which will continue to improve with further use
product_description: Differin Gel Acne Treatment contains adapalene, an Rx-strength acne-fighting retinoid that helps clear breakouts where they start (works deep into pores in 5 minutes), helps prevents new acne from forming, and as a result, can restore skin's overall tone and texture. Adapalene is the first over-the-counter active ingredient for acne in more than 30 years. It clears acne with the power of an Rx without the prescription, prevents breakouts, blackheads, whiteheads, blemishes and clogged pores, and can be used to effectively treat acne, or maskne, caused by wearing face masks or facial coverings. When used as directed, you could start to see results in as little as 1 week, and when used every single day, Differin Gel can help reduce up to 87% of acne in just 12 weeks (Cunliffe et al 1998, Galderma Laboratories).

name: Neutrogena Rapid Clear Stubborn Acne Spot Treatment Gel, Maximum Strength 10% Benzoyl Per-oxide Treatment Medication for Acne Prone Skin, Pimple Cream Reduces Size & Redness, 1 oz
short_description: Maximum strength: Contains 10% benzoyl peroxide for powerful acne treatment; rapidly targets stubborn pimples and breakouts to help achieve clearer-looking skin without a prescription
Spot treatment: Fast-acting pimple cream spot treatment gel visibly reduces size and redness of acne in just 2 hours; designed for acne-prone facial skin and daily use for continuous improvement
Benzoyl peroxide gel: Clinically proven acne gel formula penetrates pores to fight breakouts and helps prevent future acne
Acne gel for face: Specially formulated for acne-prone skin, this maximum strength benzoyl peroxide 10 percent gel helps clear existing pimples and supports a healthier, clearer complexion
Easy application: Cleanse skin thoroughly, then apply a thin layer of acne gel to affected area 1-3 times daily; non-prescription formula offers convenient, targeted acne treatment
product_description: Product Description Neutrogena Rapid Clear Stubborn Acne Spot Treatment Gel is a maximum strength acne gel formu-lated with 10% benzoyl peroxide, a dermatologist recommended acne ingredient. This precision spot treatment is clinically proven to visibly reduce the size and redness of stubborn acne pimples in just two hours and helps prevent future breakouts. Designed for acne-prone skin, the non-prescription gel delivers continuous improvement of blemishes and clearer-looking skin with daily use. The 1 oz tube is ideal for targeted application on the face, making it easy to address problem areas as they appear. To use, cleanse skin thoroughly and apply a thin layer of gel to affected are-as one to three times daily, following the recommended frequency for best results. Experience the benefits of an acne gel that combines the maximum strength of 10% benzoyl peroxide with the convenience of a spot treatment for effective, visible results. Brand Story By Neutrogena

short_description: Daily Acne Treatment: This once-daily topical retinoid acne treatment, previously only available by prescription, is formulated to unclog pores and clear acne; Dermatologist developed and tested; Oil free and fragrance free

AcneFree delivers proven results combining acne-fighting & caring ingredients to treat acne breakouts and balance your skin. AcneFree is committed to deliver quality products for oily & acne prone skin. It does not guarantee that you will be free of acne
product_description: A derivative of Vitamin A, Adapalene gel 0.1% is a member of the retinoid ingredient family and previously only available by prescription. Retinoid help slow down the accumulation of dead skin cells in the pores, which is a main contributor to breakouts. Retinoid also help prevent and improve white heads and blackheads because they increase cell turnover. Studies have shown that compared to other retinoid, Adapalene gel 0.1% causes less irritation to the skin. Adapalene gel is oil-free, fragrance-free and dermatologist developed.

short_description: ACNE-FIGHTING SPOT GEL: When unwanted blemishes just pop up, call a fast SOS with this roll-on acne gel spot treatment.

PREVENTS NEW BLEMISHES: The e.l.f. SKIN Blemish Breakthrough Acne Fighting Spot Gel helps treat, soothe and reduce the discomfort of current acne while preventing new blemishes. Great for oily and acne-prone skin.

INFUSED WITH SALICYLIC ACID: This dermatologist-developed gel is made with 1% Salicylic Acid, which helps treat current blemishes and prevent new ones by clarifying pores, Aloe, which soothes skin, and Witch Hazel, which helps soothe and reduce excess oil.
HOW TO USE: Up to three times a day, roll the treatment over any blemishes, blackheads, and breakout-prone areas to easily target acne (no dirty fingers needed!) so your skin is in the clear.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% cruelty-free and Vegan.

name: Differin Acne Spot Treatment with 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, Maximum Strength OTC Acne Treatment, Fast Acting Spot Treatment for Face, 1 oz
short_description: MAXIMUM STRENGTH 10% BENZOYL PEROXIDE: One 1 oz tube of Differin Acne Spot Treatment with 10% benzoyl peroxide as the strongest over-the-counter (OTC) concentration to visibly reduce acne size and redness after 1 use.
FAST BLEMISH SPOT TREATMENT: Penetrates deep into pores and works to immediately kill acne-causing bacteria
FOUR-IN-ONE ACNE TREATMENT FOR FACE: Acne solution that treats imperfections, prevents acne, targets acne-causing bacteria, and improves skin texture
FORMULATED WITH GLYCERIN: While benzoyl peroxide starts clearing acne blemishes, glycerin helps to minimize dryness
HOW TO USE: After cleansing with a gentle face wash, apply spot treatment on dry skin directly on affected areas, followed by moisturizer and SPF, and reapply as needed
product_description: Differin 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Spot Treatment is an acne treatment for face and body use, developed for acne-prone skin. This four-in-one solution treats acne, prevents acne, kills acne-causing bacteria, and improves skin texture. Formulated with 10% benzoyl peroxide, the strongest OTC concentration without a prescription, and glycerin to minimize dryness, it immediately targets acne-causing bacteria and effectively prevents imperfections. This multi-action pimple cream clears and treats acne, whiteheads, blackheads, and clogged pores, visibly reducing size and redness after first use. Use as part of your skincare routine to treat and clear acne and other imperfections. After cleaning with a facial cleanser, apply on dry skin directly on affected areas. Follow up with a moisturizer and SPF in the morning and night cream at night. Reapply as needed. Dry skin may occur while using this product, so start with one application daily and gradually increase it if needed.

name: The INKEY List Succinic Acid Treatment 15ml, Clears Blemishes, Acne Treatment, Vegan Friendly, Suitable For All Skin Types
short_description: POWERFUL INGREDIENTS - Using 2% Succinic Acid to treat blemishes, the treatment gently reduces blemish size, reduces oil levels and unblock pores whilst also helping prevent them from clogging again after use; Combined with 2% Sulfur and 1% Salicylic Acid, this targeted treatment will help shrink blemishes and blackheads whilst remaining gentle on the skin.
FOR ALL SKIN TYPES - Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive, it is cruelty-free and fragrance-free

HOW TO USE - Can be applied to a blemish up to three times per day; We suggest cleansing with Salicylic Acid Cleanser, followed by hydrating skin with Hyaluronic Acid before applying Succinic Acid Treatment; Place a small amount of Succinic Acid from the tube onto a clean finger and apply directly onto the blemish; If you would like to use other skincare or makeup on top, leave the formula to dry for 5 minutes before applying
